definition: fragrant/sweet smelling/aromatic/savory or appetizing/(to eat) with relish/(of sleep) sound/perfume or spice/joss or incense stick/CL:根[gen1]
cigarette or pipe tobacco/CL:根[gen1]/smoke/mist/vapour/CL:縷|缕[lu:3]/tobacco plant/(of the eyes) to be irritated by smoke

sentences.english: He came in, holding a cigarette between his lips.
sentences.chinese: 他嘴上叨着香烟走了进来。

sentences.english: Cigarettes,camp-fires and barbecues can all start a fire in the countryside.
sentences.chinese: 香烟，营火和烧烤全部能开始一燃烧在那些农村内。

sentences.english: The man struck a match to light a cigar.
sentences.chinese: 那人划着了一根火柴扑灭一根香烟。

sentences.english: A young woman exhales cigarette smoke in Shanghai, China.
sentences.chinese: 在中国上海的一位年轻的妇女呼出香烟的烟雾。

sentences.english: How many tax-free cigarettes and wines can I take if I travel to UK?3.
sentences.chinese: 叨教可以免税携带多少香烟和酒？

sentences.english: She stubbed out the cigarette after the first puff.
sentences.chinese: 她只抽了一口香烟就把它掐灭了。

sentences.english: Cigarette smoke and radiation also produce free radicals.
sentences.chinese: 香烟烟雾和辐射同样会产生自由基。

sentences.english: There are plenty of extras, including a cigarette-lighter adapter.
sentences.chinese: 有很多群众演员，包括香烟打火机适配器。

sentences.english: He fumbled his one-handed attempt to light his cigarette.
sentences.chinese: 他笨拙地想用一只手点燃香烟。

sentences.english: Czeslaw tore the cigarette out of Piotr’s mouth.
sentences.chinese: 切斯沃夫从彼得亚雷的嘴上一把扯下香烟。

sentences.english: Yeah, Barney, Winston tastes good like a cigarette should.
sentences.chinese: 是的，巴尼，温斯顿吸起来才是真正的香烟。

sentences.english: You may bring up to two liters of alcohol and two cartons of cigarettes to the Caribbean islands.
sentences.chinese: 您可能会带来两个公升酒精和两箱香烟给加勒比岛屿。

sentences.english: Supermarkets can afford to retail cigarettes at a couple of cents below the price charged by most tobacconists.
sentences.chinese: 超市能以比大多数烟商低几便士的价格出售香烟。

sentences.english: It’s where we shared cigarettes and gossip.
sentences.chinese: 这就是我们分享香烟和绯闻是非的地方。

sentences.english: Some reach for cigarettes, or at least the fluffy white fibers found in their filters.
sentences.chinese: 有些鸟儿抓到香烟，发现过滤嘴上有白色的绒毛纤维。

sentences.english: I don't have a lighter because I only happen to smoke O. P. B.
sentences.chinese: 我没有打火机，因为我只是偶尔抽他人的香烟。

definition: cigarette or pipe tobacco/CL:根[gen1]/smoke/mist/vapour/CL:縷|缕[lu:3]/tobacco plant/(of the eyes) to be irritated by smoke
see 打火機|打火机[da3 huo3 ji1]
